messages.subject: unschooling moms
messages.msgSnippet: Dear fellow unschooler members, I have learned so much being a member of this unschooling group this year.  Now, I need your help.  I am recruiting independent
messages.messageBody:
Dear fellow unschooler members, I have learned so much being a member of
this unschooling group this year. Now, I need your help. I am recruiting
independent account managers for Schoolpop. The ideal account manager is an
organized stay-at-home mom or former teacher who is involved with local
schools, wants work out of their home, set their own hours and make good
money. I thought you might know of someone in your area who would be just
right.

Schoolpop is going to be carrying Over and Above Kids Art of Learning
Program. Schoolpop offers a hassle-free program for PTAs to raise money by
selling name-brand educational products such as Leap Frog below retail price
and with no inventory processing. I am on the lookout for community leaders
to introduce and represent Schoolpop's offerings to schools and PTAs. An
independent account manager would set his/her own hours, earn money every
sale made by the participating schools, receive an exclusive territory with
no upfront costs and help make a difference in the community. If you know
of anyone who would be an ideal independent account manager, have them check
out www.shop.schoolpop.com and then contact ME DIRECTLY at 252 361 5437 or
susan@....

Susan Myers
Chairman and Founder
Over and Above Kids, Inc.
6052 Lansing Dr
Charlotte NC 28270
252 361 5437 cell
susan@...
